text.div:
NameFlagsCard.TypeDescription & Constraints
Observation I0..*APGAR Score Observation
inv-apgar01: APGAR 1 minute component codes must match observation type
inv-apgar02: APGAR 5 minute component codes must match observation type
inv-apgar03: APGAR 10 minute component codes must match observation type
code 1..1CodeableConceptAPGAR score observation type
coding CodingSlice: Unordered, Open by value:system
coding 1..1CodingBinding: APGAR Score Observation Types (required)
coding 0..1CodingBinding: APGAR Score Observation Types (SNOMED CT) (example)
subject 1..1Reference(Patient)
effectiveDateTime 0..1dateTime
valueQuantity 0..1Quantity
value 1..1decimal
system 1..1uriFixed Value: http://unitsofmeasure.org
code 1..1codeFixed Value: {score}
component BackboneElementSlice: Unordered, Open by value:code
component 0..1BackboneElementAPGAR colour
code 1..1CodeableConceptBinding: APGAR Colour ObservationTypes (required)
valueCodeableConcept 1..1CodeableConceptBinding: APGAR Colour Findings (required)
component 0..1BackboneElementAPGAR heart rate
code 1..1CodeableConceptBinding: APGAR Heart Rate Observation Types (required)
valueCodeableConcept 1..1CodeableConceptBinding: APGAR Heart Rate Findings (required)
component 0..1BackboneElementAPGAR muscle tone
code 1..1CodeableConceptBinding: APGAR Muscle Tone Observation Types (required)
valueCodeableConcept 1..1CodeableConceptBinding: APGAR Muscle Tone Findings (required)
component 0..1BackboneElementAPGAR respiratory effort
code 1..1CodeableConceptBinding: APGAR Respiratory Effort Observation Types (required)
valueCodeableConcept 1..1CodeableConceptBinding: APGAR Respiratory Effort Findings (required)
component 0..1BackboneElementAPGAR reflex irritability
code 1..1CodeableConceptBinding: APGAR Reflex Irritability Observation Types (required)
valueCodeableConcept 1..1CodeableConceptBinding: APGAR Reflex Irritability Findings (required)

Documentation for this format

name: NCDHC APGAR Scores Observation Profile
title: NCDHC APGAR Scores
description: A set of observations made on the baby following birth to check adaptation to life outside the womb.  This includes 1 minute, 5 minutes and 10 minutes

constraint.human: APGAR 1 minute component codes must match observation type
constraint.expression: (component.where(code.coding.where(code='32406-1').exists()).exists() or component.where(code.coding.where(code='32407-9').exists()).exists() or component.where(code.coding.where(code='32408-7').exists()).exists() or component.where(code.coding.where(code='32410-3').exists()).exists() or component.where(code.coding.where(code='32409-5').exists()).exists()) implies code.coding.where(code='9272-6').exists()

constraint.human: APGAR 5 minute component codes must match observation type
constraint.expression: (component.where(code.coding.where(code='32406-1').exists()).exists() or component.where(code.coding.where(code='32407-9').exists()).exists() or component.where(code.coding.where(code='32408-7').exists()).exists() or component.where(code.coding.where(code='32410-3').exists()).exists() or component.where(code.coding.where(code='32409-5').exists()).exists()) implies code.coding.where(code='9272-6').exists()

constraint.human: APGAR 10 minute component codes must match observation type
constraint.expression: (component.where(code.coding.where(code='32401-2').exists()).exists() or component.where(code.coding.where(code='32402-0').exists()).exists() or component.where(code.coding.where(code='32403-8').exists()).exists() or component.where(code.coding.where(code='32405-3').exists()).exists() or component.where(code.coding.where(code='32404-6').exists()).exists()) implies code.coding.where(code='9271-8').exists()
